ASOBO_GT_Switch_Code
UseTemplate.LEFT_SINGLE_CODE: (L:XMLVAR_RMP_#SIDE#_On) ! (>L:XMLVAR_RMP_#SIDE#_On) (L:XMLVAR_RMP_#SIDE#_On) if{ 0 (>L:XMLVAR_RMP_#SIDE#_GROUP_FREQ_IS_DISABLED) (* FREQ group enabled *) 1 (>L:XMLVAR_RMP_#SIDE#_GROUP_MODE_IS_DISABLED) (* MODE group disabled *) 1 (>L:XMLVAR_RMP_#SIDE#_CURRENT_BUTTON_IN_GROUP_FREQ) (* Default FREQ group is button 1 (VHF1) *) 0 (>L:XMLVAR_RMP_#SIDE#_CURRENT_BUTTON_IN_GROUP_MODE) (* Default MODE group is button 0 (NONE) *) 0 (>L:XMLVAR_RMP_#SIDE#_AM_Active) (* AM button off *) 0 (>L:XMLVAR_RMP_#SIDE#_NAV_Active) (* NAV button off *) 0 (>L:XMLVAR_RMP_#SIDE#_BFO_Active) (* BFO button off *) } (>H:A320_Neo_FDW_SWITCH_#SIDE#_TOGGLE)

UseTemplate.Name: ASOBO_GT_Update
UseTemplate.UPDATE_CODE: (L:XMLVAR_RMP_#SIDE#_INIT) ! if{ 1 (>L:XMLVAR_RMP_#SIDE#_On) (* Start with the switch on *) 1 (>L:XMLVAR_RMP_#SIDE#_GROUP_MODE_IS_DISABLED) (* MODE group disabled *) 1 (>L:XMLVAR_RMP_#SIDE#_CURRENT_BUTTON_IN_GROUP_FREQ) (* Default FREQ group is button 1 (VHF1) *) (>H:A320_Neo_FDW_SWITCH_#SIDE#_TOGGLE) 1 (>L:XMLVAR_RMP_#SIDE#_INIT) (* INIT complete *) }

UseTemplate.Name: ASOBO_GT_Emissive_Gauge
FBW_RMP_GROUPED_BUTTON_WITH_LIGHTS_Template
UseTemplate.OPTIONAL_ACTIVE_IF: (* MLS isn't working in videos showing RMP functionality. It is also not working in X-Plane. Ours now doesn't work either! *) 0

UseTemplate.Name: FBW_RMP_BUTTON_WITH_LIGHTS_Template
ASOBO_GT_Update
UseTemplate.UPDATE_CODE: (A:TURB ENG N1:1, Percent) #MIN_N1# > (A:GENERAL ENG COMBUSTION:1, Bool) and (A:TURB ENG N1:2, Percent) #MIN_N1# > (A:GENERAL ENG COMBUSTION:2, Bool) and + 1 == (>L:XMLVAR_PTU_ON)

UseTemplate.Name: A32NX_ENGINE_MODE_SELECTOR_SUBTEMPLATE
UseTemplate.STATE0_TEST: (A:TURB ENG IGNITION SWITCH EX1:#ENGINE_CURRENT#, Enum) 0 == #STATE0_TEST# and
UseTemplate.STATE1_TEST: (A:TURB ENG IGNITION SWITCH EX1:#ENGINE_CURRENT#, Enum) 1 == #STATE1_TEST# and
UseTemplate.STATE2_TEST: (A:TURB ENG IGNITION SWITCH EX1:#ENGINE_CURRENT#, Enum) 2 == #STATE2_TEST# and
